title: Revealing the importance of non-radical mechanisms in the degradation of sulfamethazine by Lewis acid-etched Co@MXene-activated peroxyacetic acid
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00453A, Paper
Dezhu Liu, Siling Zhang, Zhenwei Zou, Zheng Fang, Ping Chen, Zongshun Yu, Zhenchao Li, Xiaoyu Zhang, Zili Lin, Wenying Lv, Guoguang Liu
The activation of peracetic acid (PAA) based advanced oxidation processes (AOPs) has emerged as a research hotspot in eliminating organic pollutants. Here, Co@MXene etched with Lewis acid was employed to...
